titleStmt.title: A godly dream, compyled by Elizabeth Melvil, Lady Culrosse younger. At the request of a friend.
titleStmt.author: Colville of Culross, Elizabeth Colville, Lady.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
